Sorry guy's 
 
Was just finishing up deleting my files from the files sect=
ion when
I saw this post and being an italian from brooklyn just could not =
live with myself if I didn't
respond.
 
Michelle be carefull what you say, =
if you are looking for a fraud you need look no further than the end of you=
r nose, which is where you will find the asshole of the biggest fraud in th=
e buisness.
your lord and master, need I mention the name, if you actuall t=
ook the time to shut that sewer you call a mouth and listened to my files y=
ou would realise that most of them I repeat the real time answer I hear flu=
idly.
 
If you have the balls which I think you do, tell your little buddy =
to come to jersey because as a real man I was disabled saving lives so I ca=
n not go to him or I would have been there already. instead of sucking my m=
ama's tit like your mentor.
have him come to jersey and I will accomidate h=
im in a live box session him with his me with mine and we will see who the =
fraud really is. 
 
p.s. you would think after all that mouth action your j=
aw would be tired.
 
Bruce
Bruce Halliday

ay look at meas a stirrer of whatever you want to say I'm stirring. If it c=

posted files. One of you freaked out when I suggestedthat raw files should =

ainly apologize. > > Perhaps we'd react differently if you participated her=

rexample, "Hey, Ann--that file you just posted, I hear what you do, butis a=
nything clipped out of it? I think I hear a track silenced, too.If so, why =
did you do that?" Then I get to answer and explain why Idid it that way, of=
fer the raw clip, or whatever. It doesn't come offas a broad attack--just a=
 friendly question. Even Bruce wouldn't ripout your living eyeballs for tha=
t. (Well... maybe he wouldn't, anyway.;) ) > > I agree with your search for=
 The Truth. I really do. That's why yousee me get all rough-and-tumble over=

 But it's waaaaaay tooearly in "boxology" to try to make it perform as a pe=
t circus animal.Hell, we've been studying traditional EVP for 30 years and =
it stillwon't perform on cue for the scientists or anyone else. But if youj=
ust listen to what you get on your own and what all the others aregetting, =
it becomes very clear indeed that a real phenomenon isoccurring. Sure, some=
 things we get that we think are paranormal maybe just radio fragments, but=
 one radio fragment does not negate allbox communication. One tweaked clip =
is not indicative of a culture ofresearcher deceit. One "I am Bazoozoo! Tim=
e to fry, foolish mortal!"does not mean that the RS hacks are pathways to S=
atan's indoorplumbing. There are no easy answers yet--and there may never b=
e any.And I'm not sure we're at the stage yet where we have the right todem=
and The Truth or whether we would even see it if it was staring usin the fa=
ce.> > All right, enough joy in myself one-hand clapping.> > LC is right th=
at if you want to try to pursue this in the way youwant to pursue it, then =
you need to find some people who share yourmindset and go to it. I don't th=
ink you're going to find those peoplehere, necessarily--at least among the =
old guard. We're the beatniks inblack leather, smoking ciggies and reading =
bad poetry to the beat ofbongos, HMO.> > Ann> > > > On Jan 21, 2008, at 1:3=
7 PM, babiarz3 wrote:> > > > > Just to clear things up.. the file I'm refer=
ring to is not fromanyoneinvolved in this group so when I say that occasion=
ally I heartheirvoices become shaky, that is not a comment on anyone here.A=
lso,please don't misread what I actually said. The point I made, ortriedto =
make, about the investigators not hearing what I heard...Iwouldn't have hea=
rd all of it in real time either. Too manylayers,too fast, etc. I have the =
luxury now of sitting and analyzingthe filein my own time. As for fear bein=
g a factor... I do believethat the attitude of theinvestigators present dur=
ing a session doeseffect the outcome. EvenBruce who would rather cut my eye=
balls outwith a razor has said thesame. If you think that I am scared, fine=
. IfI'm missing one thing itis probably a healthy dose of fear. Don't maket=
he mistake of missingthe points by name calling. I post my thoughtshere bec=
ause it is an active group of peopleworking with this form ofITC. You can c=
all me a shit stirrer orwhatever you want. The point isthat I see issues th=
at could beaddressed fairly easily. You can ignoreit or deflect all you wan=
t.For me, it's not about being friends, it'sabout the research. --- In EVP-=
